des, dass die Gültigkeitsdauer des Aufenthaltstitels, an den es anzuknüpfen galt, mit
drei Monaten insgesamt sogar kürzer als der Verspätungszeitraum war. Überdies ist
auch nicht zu erkennen, dass die Fristüberschreitung unverschuldet oder auf einfa-
che Fahrlässigkeit zurückzuführen wäre. Insoweit kann der Antragsteller nicht mit
Erfolg geltend machen, seine Bemühungen um eine Wohnsitzanmeldung seien wäh-
rend der fraglichen Zeit – vor allem verursacht durch betrügerisches Verhalten eines
vermeintlichen Vermieters – erfolglos geblieben. Der Antragsteller musste erkennen,

can be divided (see OVG Berlin-Brandenburg, decision of April 8, 2016, loc. cit.;
OVG Bremen, decision of April 6, 2022 - 2 B 314/21 -, juris). Even the
minor nature of the deadline being exceeded is absent here. In the case at hand, there were five months between
the expiry of the visa's validity in June 2023 and the application for a residence
permit, which was not submitted until November 2023. Insofar as this period in itself
already exceeds the limit of insignificance, this applies all the more in view of the fact that the
period of validity of the residence permit, to which it was necessary to adhere,
was even shorter than the period of delay, i.e. three months. Furthermore,
there is no indication that the failure to meet the deadline was due to no fault of his own
or to simple negligence. Insofar, the applicant cannot
successfully claim that his efforts to register his residence were unsuccessful during the period
under consideration, caused primarily by the
fraudulent behavior of an alleged landlord. The applicant should have realized that,
